name: DreamWorks The Croods: Prehistoric Party! & Rise of the Guardians: Combo Pack
overview: The combo pack contains the full versions of The Croods: Prehistoric Party! and Rise of the Guardians: The Video Game. It is loaded with action, adventure, and excitement featuring beloved DreamWorks Animation characters, and are sure to provide hours of multiplayer family fun for kids of all ages! Features: The Croods: Prehistoric Party! The Croods: Prehistoric Party! combines the ultimate fun of a family party game with Croods-style action as you journey through 30 unique and addictive minigames! Compete in 30 unique and addictive Croods-themed Party games! Play as any one of the lovable Croods family members! Features spectacular landscapes and never-before-seen creatures from the film! 4-Player Multiplayer Rise of the Guardians: The Video Game Let your imagination soar in Rise of the Guardians: The Video Game as you play as one of the classic childhood legends, including: North (aka Santa Claus), Tooth (aka the Tooth Fairy), Bunnymund (aka the Easter Bunny), Sandman, and Jack Frost. Play as the Guardians to take on Pitch in a deep and intuitive adventure combat game Unlock power-ups and character upgrades Explore Legendary Guardian Realms 4 player same-screen multiplayer
